code:
---
title: Dozzle agent
config:
    theme: dark
---

flowchart LR
    classDef cluster fill:#ffffff00,stroke:#aabbccff,stroke-width:3px,rx:8px,ry:8px;
    classDef node fill:#ffffff00,stroke:#aabbccff,stroke-width:2px,rx:5px,ry:5px;
    classDef dashed_border stroke-dasharray:10 6;
    classDef strong_border stroke-width:6px;

    subgraph app_wrapper[Groupware_IssueTracker]
        inbound_interface(Groupware_KanbanBoard)
        app(Groupware_ChatRoom)
        class app strong_border;
        socket_proxy(Groupware_KanbanBoard)
        docker(Groupware_KanbanBoard)

        inbound_interface -->|:7007|app
        app -.->|docker tcp| socket_proxy -.->|docker sock| docker
    end

    subgraph others_1[Groupware_SprintBacklog]
        home_network(Groupware_WikiPage)
        dozzle_server(Groupware_KanbanBoard)
        gatus(Groupware_SprintBacklog)

        home_network <--> inbound_interface
        dozzle_server -->|collect logs| inbound_interface
        gatus -->|monitor| inbound_interface
    end
